text:
December 18, 1956
Dr. Ann L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street Northwest
Washington 6, D. G.
Dear Ann:
I*m inclined to think the terms of our grant pretty positively prevent use of our
Workshop Funds far anything except educational television directly. Otherwise we
would be accused of trying to dominate in some way an area not our own. They are
also available only to educational institutions far the development of further
and better offerings for training ETV station ami production center personnel,
essentially (at least as defined in our grant). I wish we had funds available to
do what you suggest, because it is a mighty important need.
I*m sorry about the three programs you can’t list, but I’m glad that you are able
to get and list the rest of those discussed. At least that’s considerable progress,
even though a little short of 100$.
Our best at the holiday season.
Sincerely,
HJSjdfc
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
